product_name: Columbia Parallel Descent Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: Go ahead and take another ride down the slopes in the Columbia Parallel Descent(TM) jacket. It features Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining and warm insulation to keep you comfortable. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable nylon shell resists abrasion and breathes well; seams are fully sealed to keep moisture from getting in. Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining features small silver dots that reflect heat back to your body while dissipating moisture and excess heat to keep you comfortable. Partially recycled polyester insulation does an excellent job of keeping you toasty on cold days. Includes zippered hand pockets, a waterproof chest pocket, ski pass pocket, media/goggles pocket and an internal security pocket. Removable, adjustable storm hood; pit zips; thumbholes in the sleeves. Columbia Parallel Descent(TM) insulated jacket has a drawcord hem, adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs and an adjustable powder skirt to seal out the elements and retain warmth.
short_description: Go ahead and take another ride down the slopes in the Columbia Parallel Descent(TM) jacket. It features Omni-Heat(TM) thermal reflective lining and warm insulation to keep you comfortable.
